card.name: Eternal Phoenix, Dragonflame Phoenix
card.text: ■ Vortex evolution—Put on one of your Fire Birds and one of your Armored Dragons. ■ Double Breaker ■ Each of your Phoenix or Dragons in the battle zone can attack untapped creatures. ■ When this creature leaves the battle zone, return all non-evolution creature

card.name: Auzesu, Demonic Elemental
card.text: ■ Multi ■ Sympathy ■ Whenever one of your Angel Commands or Demon Commands attacks, destroy one of your opponent's tapped creatures. ■ Double Breaker

card.name: Asylum, Elemental Dragon Knight
card.text: ■ Multi ■ Sympathy ■ Double Breaker ■ When this creature would be destroyed, add it to your shields face down instead.

card.name: Dolgeza, Strong Striker
card.text: ■ Multi ■ Sympathy ■ When you put this creature into the battle zone, you may draw a card for each of your Earth Eaters in the battle zone. Then you may draw a card for each of your Giants in the battle zone. ■ Double Breaker

card.name: Galamuta, Matchless Fear Lord
card.text: ■ Sympathy ■ Whenever this creature attacks, neither player may use "shield trigger" abilities this turn.

card.name: Balhols, Demonic Elemental
card.text: ■ Multi ■ Blocker ■ Each of your opponent's creatures must attack if able. ■ This creature can't attack players. ■ Whenever this creature blocks, untap it after the battle.

card.name: Asteria, Heaven's Blessing Elemental
card.text: ■ Blocker ■ This creature can't attack players. ■ Whenever your opponent draws a card except when drawing a card at the Step#Step 2 (Draw)

card.name: Pacific Champion
card.text: ■ Evolution—Put on one of your Merfolk. ■ This creature can't be attacked or blocked by non-evolution creatures.

card.name: Spiritual Star Dragon
card.text: ■ Double Breaker ■ When you put this creature into the battle zone, search your deck. You may take a creature that evolution creature

card.name: Courtney, Summer Breeze Faerie
card.text: ■ Cards in your mana zone are considered to be cards of every civilization.

card.name: The Grave of Angels and Demons
card.text: ■ Multi ■ Shield Trigger ■ If there are 2 or more creatures that have the same Card Name ■ Look at each player's mana zone. If there are 2 or more cards that have the same Card Name

card.name: Fortification Against Barrage and Ambush
card.text: ■ Multi ■ Reveal cards from the top of your deck until you reveal a creature. Destroy all creatures that have less power than that creature. Put all revealed cards into your graveyard.

card.name: Akashic Third, the Electro-Bandit
card.text: ■ Whenever this creature battles, reveal cards from the top of your deck until you reveal a creature. This creature becomes the revealed creature until the End Step

card.name: Zereem Crawler
card.text: ■ This creature can attack untapped fire creatures. ■ This creature can't attack players.

card.name: Funeral Song of the Beasts
card.text: ■ Each of your creatures in the battle zone gets +4000 power and "Whenever this creature is attacking your opponent and becomes blocked, it breaks one of your opponent's shields" until the End Step

card.name: Melcap, the Mutant Explorer
card.text: ■ Multi ■ Whenever this creature attacks your opponent and isn't blocked, tap all your opponent's creatures in the battle zone.

card.name: Funnoo, Bloody Winds Officer
card.text: ■ Blocker ■ Multi ■ Speed Attacker ■ Whenever one of your opponent's creatures breaks one of your shields, destroy this creature at the end of that turn.

card.name: Stronghold of Lightning and Flame
card.text: ■ Shield Trigger ■ Destroy one of your opponent's creatures that has power 3000 or less. Then you may choose one of your opponent's creatures in the battle zone and tap it.

card.name: Tick Tick, Swift Viral Swordfighter
card.text: ■ Speed Attacker ■ Whenever this creature attacks, you may draw a card.

card.name: Judgement of the Flame's Spear and the Water's Blade
card.text: ■ Multi ■ Destroy all creatures that have power 3000 or less. Then you may draw a card for each creature destroyed.

card.name: Pulpy Goobie
card.text: ■ Blocker ■ When you put this creature into the battle zone, look at up to 5 cards from the top of your deck. Then put them back in any order. ■ This creature can't attack.

card.name: Langren, the Lone Wolf
card.text: ■ This creature can't attack if there is another untapped creature in the battle zone.

card.name: Zack Ranba, the Sword Attacker
card.text: ■ While all cards in your mana zone are tapped, this creature gets +2000 power.

card.name: Pixie Cocoon
card.text: ■ Shield Trigger ■ Return a creature from your mana zone to your hand. ■ After you cast this spell, put it into your mana zone tapped instead of your graveyard.
